CUSTOMERS ALSO BOUGHT [Optimal Energy - 3 Pack (360 Capsules)](/bundles/optimal-energy-3-pack) Created for Those Who Want an Abundance of Cognitive Energy and Mental Clarity Optimal Energy is a potent and synergistic blend of the most powerful mitochondrial-enhancing ingredients. It includes 15 nutrients, nutraceuticals, botanicals, and Krebs cycle intermediates. And they have one thing in common... They are all known to support efficient mitochondrial metabolism and energy production in the brain, which increases your cognitive energy and mental clarity. They literally charge up your brain cells, so you can have all-day energy and clarity. Optimal Energy can help anyone who wants to increase their mental output and reach optimal cognitive performance. While caffeine and other stimulants give you a short-term artificial boost, Optimal Energy works at a deeper level and promotes overall cellular vitality and health. It can be life-changing for individuals suffering from burnout, debilitating fatigue, and brain fog, including those diagnosed with chronic fatigue syndrome and fibromyalgia. Imagine restoring your mental clarity, and feeling as energetic, smart and capable as you used to be. What if you could have a lifetime filled with boundless energy? If you've been struggling with fatigue or low energy levels, it's time to stop dragging yourself through the day with coffee and stimulants. It's time to start building real energy. It's time for Optimal Energy. Build Up Your Brain's Energy and Regain Your Vitality Naturally Optimal Energy is an energy formula that is backed by science and proven to change your life in just weeks. How? In each of your brain cells, you have components called mitochondria. Your mitochondria make adenosine triphosphate (ATP). And ATP is the fuel and energy your brain cells run on. So mitochondria are essentially the "energy generators" that power your 100 billion brain cells. But as you age, your mitochondria become damaged and dysfunctional. They even shrink in size! Plus, the world we live in today is riddled with environmental toxins that wear down your mitochondria. Pesticides, fertilizers, chemicals, drugs, radiation, smog, and preservatives — just to name a few — all have a damaging effect on the mitochondria in your brain. As a result, the energy your mitochondria naturally produce decreases over time, reducing your brain power and cognitive energy. If you have chronic mental fatigue and brain fog, you likely have weak, damaged and dysfunctional mitochondria. That's where Optimal Energy comes in... It works by healing and recharging your mitochondria, the energy generators of your brain. It supports your brain's ability to generate energy at the cellular level. It inspires and re-awakens your brain's built-in energy system. It enhances your immediate and long-term energy — without caffeine, stimulants and sugar. Your brain will become capable of producing more energy on its own again. You'll have a clearer, sharper, faster, and more resilient brain. And you'll operate at a higher level than you ever dreamed possible — at any age. Experience the Difference There's no shortage of energy supplements on the market. So, here are 8 ways Optimal Energy stands above the rest... 1) PRECISE FORMULA Not all formulations are created equal. Optimal Energy is a superior formula that resulted from careful and deliberate research, and close attention to detail. We didn't just stuff undetectable trace amounts of 100s of ingredients into a supplement. We took our time to identify the most premium and innovative energy-boosting ingredients. And we landed on just the right ingredients and doses to support maximal cognitive energy and mental clarity. 2) EVIDENCE-BASED DESIGN All our supplements, including Optimal Energy, are crafted with the ideal combinations of therapeutic ingredients and potencies to maximize successful results for you. Only well-researched ingredients and nutrients backed by intensive scientific research are selected and included in our formulas. We wouldn't have it any other way. 3) PREMIUM INGREDIENTS Sadly - to save money and cut corners - some companies use inferior, low-grade ingredients that often originate from contaminated sources. Thankfully, we don't, and Optimal Energy provides the highest-quality energy-enhancing ingredients. Each of the ingredients come from premium sources and have been rigorously tested for potency. We simply refuse to cut corners with substandard ingredients. 4) BIOAVAILABLE NUTRIENTS Optimal Energy gives you the world's healthiest ingredients in the most potent, bioavailable forms possible. This means that your body actually recognizes the nutrients, absorbs them, and uses them. That way, your mitochondria can soak them up like a sponge and you get a bigger boost in energy. 5) LONG-TERM BENEFITS Many energy supplements only give short-term effects. We take it a step further and focus on building up your long-term energy as well. Optimal Energy works at a deeper level and promotes overall cellular vitality and health. It does this by healing and recharging your mitochondria, "the powerhouse of the cell." 6) SYNERGISTIC EFFECTS When designing Optimal Energy, our goal was to craft a unique combination of ingredients. We wanted to put the best mitochondrial ingredients on earth into a precise "synergistic" formula. This would mean the synergy between the ingredients would lead to even more energy and clarity for you. We succeeded, and Optimal Energy produces the amazing synergistic effects that we were looking for. You could try to take each of the nutrients alone. But you wouldn't benefit from the synergistic power they provide when combined together in Optimal Energy. 7) SAFE & EFFECTIVE Optimal Energy uses the safest and most effective energy-boosting nutrients. Every ingredient in Optimal Energy has been rigorously tested for safety and widely considered safe to consume. They are also supported by decades of clinical research. 8) 100% NATURAL, PURE & ALLERGEN FREE Optimal Energy is made with 100% natural ingredients and extracts. It's 100% non-GMO and gluten-free, and has no artificial preservatives, chemicals, sugar, caffeine, stimulants, fillers, heavy metals, or any other junk. All ingredients undergo strict and comprehensive lab testing to ensure they meet rigorous quality standards and purity. Only the purest form of each ingredient is used. What's in Optimal Energy? Optimal Energy is the most powerful mitochondria-enhancing supplement ever created. It's like a 5-star meal for the mitochondria within your brain. It's packed and loaded with 15 science-backed ingredients proven to boost cellular energy levels in the brain. We spent hundreds of hours reading scientific studies from around the world to uncover these mitochondria-building ingredients. We selected the safest, most studied, and most effective ingredients for promoting optimal energy production in the brain. And we chose doses for each ingredient that are clinically proven to work for optimal results. Optimal Energy is the result of our extensive work. And now you can energize your brain with these critical nutrients every single day. You won't be able to find anything like this in stores because some of the ingredients are actually patented... Optimal Energy includes CoQ10, Alpha Lipoic Manganese, Ribose, Malic and Succinic Acids. These are critical components of energy production and help your brain produce more adenosine triphosphate (ATP). ATP is a high-energy molecule and often called "the body's energy currency". And when you have more currency to spend, your life gets better and much easier. Curcumin C3 Complex® and Resveratrol are also included in Optimal Energy because they have been shown to induce the production of new, additional mitochondria in the brain (mitochondrial biogenesis). They actually stimulate the process of mitochondrial biogenesis - allowing your brain to build more mitochondria from scratch! And the more mitochondria you have, the bigger your "cellular engine" will grow, and the more energy your brain will be able to produce. Energize Your Brain, Live a Better Life The key to what you want in life is a healthier, more energetic brain. Your brain affects every area of your life. And you can get more out of your life simply by giving more energy to your brain. But your brain doesn't just affect you and your life's potential. It also impacts everything and everyone around you. Even your ability to care and provide for loved ones depends on your brain's energy. If your brain is fatigued, you can't fully show up for the people you love and care about. So you NEED to feed your brain well. You need to optimize and energize it by giving it the nutrients it needs to be at its best. Improving your own health and wellbeing is actually a gift to the people around you. By taking responsibility for your brain's health, you can access the best version of yourself, and give that to the world. And when your brain is healthy and energetic, it transforms your life, and you can live your life to the fullest. Optimal Energy can help you get there.
